summary: Brutal film about the exploitation of a young Italian boy, who is virtually sold to the operators of a sulphur mine where he is beaten and sexually molested.
cast: Francesco Cusimano|Tony Sperandeo|Luigi Maria Burruano|Lucia Sardo|Giovanni Alamia|Benedetto Raneli|Giuseppe Cusimano|Rita Barbanera|Salvatore Scianna|Ignazio Donato|Luciano Venturino|Giuseppe Calcagno|Tano Cimarosa
